com.gf.service
Interface ContextService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ContextServiceImpl, Engine
public interface ContextService

Interface for editing handler's context. Main implementaion is Engine.

Author:
Evgeny Dolganov
See Also:
Handler, Inject, Engine

Method Summary

          Add some object to context.

Method Detail

addToContext

void addToContext(java.lang.Object ob)
Add some object to context. So this object can be injected into filters, interceptors, handlers.

See Also:
Inject

setContextObjects

void setContextObjects(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> objects)
Analog of multi call of addToContext(Object). For example for JavaBean logic.
